sources.title: Fortress | Full Movie | Action War Adventure | True Story | WW2
sources.description:
Fortress - Based on actual events. When the commander of the crew of a B-17 Flying Fortress bomber is killed in action in a raid over Sicily in 1943, his replacement, a young, naive pilot, struggles to be accepted by the plane's already tight-knit Irish American crew.
2012.  Stars: Bug Hall, Donnie Jeffcoat, Sean McGowan

metadata.Plot: In 2017, John Henry Brennick and his wife Karen are captured at a US immigration point with an illegal baby during population control. The resulting prison experience is the subject of the movie. The prison is run by a private corporation bent on mind control.
metadata.Writer: Troy Neighbors, Steven Feinberg, David Venable
metadata.Actors: Christopher Lambert, Loryn Locklin, Kurtwood Smith
